article.title: United Launch Service to Support Wideband Global Satellite Communication
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: United Launch Service, LLC, Littleton, Colorado, is being awarded a $150 million firm-fixed-price contract to provide Evolved Expendable Launch Vehicle launch services in support of the fifth Wideband Global Satellite Communication mission. The U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
